author: jefft
msg: - Add support for auto-conversion of faq-v10 files to faq-v11

author: jefft
msg: Reorder copying of sitemaps, so that sitemaps in src/documentation/conf/
override those in src/documentation/.  With the broken-up sitemap, there are
*.xmap files everywhere, and it seems neatest to keep them all in conf/.  This
change allows that without breaking backwards-compat

author: jefft
msg: Come to the happy realization that in subsitemaps, we can be completely general
about matching.  The <map:match> in the parent sitemap will prevent us from
handling any non-FAQ files.  For example (from Cocoon), we can have a faq/
directory filled with oddly named files, and if sitemap.xmap has:
Then all files in faq/* will be treated as FAQs.

author: jefft
msg: Add refs to doc-v10 and faq-v10 DTDs, for Cocoon tinkerings
